post.description:
Request a magic link code for authentication.
The code will be sent to the provided email address.

Verify magic link code and return authentication token with user data.
Creates a new user if they don't exist.

get.description:
Get current authenticated user information.
Requires valid JWT token in Authorization header.

post.description: Logout user by invalidating their session token.
Refresh JWT token using refresh token.

get.description:
Get total count of user's exercise files

Returns the total number of exercise files for the user.
Useful for displaying "X fiches générées" in the UI.

Response format:
{
    "total_count": 192,
    "user_id": "user123",
    "active_only": true
}

Get all unique tags used by the user for auto-suggestion

Returns a sorted list of all unique tags that the user has used across their exercise files.
This is useful for implementing tag auto-completion in the frontend.

Example response: ["conjugaison", "dictée", "multiplication", "revision", "sacha"]

parameters.name: active_only

schema.description: Only consider tags from active files
schema.title: Active Only

parameters.description: Only consider tags from active files

schema.title: Response Get Available Tags For User Api Education Exercises Files  User Id  Available Tags Get

get.summary: Get User Exercise Files By Time Period
get.description:
Get exercise files for a specific user filtered by time period

Time periods:
- today: Files created today
- week: Files from last 7 days
- month: Files from last 30 days
- 3months: Files from last 90 days
- all: All files

schema.title: Response Get User Exercise Files By Time Period Api Education Exercises Files  User Id  By Period  Period  Get

get.summary: Get User Exercise Files Filtered By Tags
get.description:
Get exercise files for a specific user filtered by tags with advanced options

This endpoint uses the DAL method for efficient tag filtering with match options:
- match_all=false (default): Files with ANY of the tags
- match_all=true: Files with ALL of the tags

parameters.name: match_all

schema.description: If true, must match ALL tags (default: ANY)
schema.title: Match All

parameters.description: If true, must match ALL tags (default: ANY)

schema.title: Response Get User Exercise Files By Tags Api Education Exercises Files  User Id  By Tags Get

post.description:
Advanced search for exercise files with multiple filters and pagination

Supports filtering by:
- class_level: Education level (CP, CE1, CE2, CM1, CM2)
- exercice_domain: Subject domain (francais, math, anglais)
- exercice_types: Exercise types (files with ANY of these types)
- tags: Tags (files with ANY or ALL based on match_all_tags)
- time_period: Time range (today, week, month, 3months, all)
- custom_name: Custom name (partial match, case-insensitive)
- active_only: Only active files (default: true)

Pagination:
- page: Page number (1-indexed, default: 1)
- page_size: Items per page (1-100, default: 20)

Returns paginated results with metadata about total count and pages.
